description.en: Given a string, we'll say that the front is the first 3 chars of the string. If the string length is less than 3, the front is whatever is there. Return a new string which is 3 copies of the front.
description.ru: Дана строка. Возьмите первые 3 символа (или все, если их меньше трех) и повторите их три раза.
description.uz: String berilgan. Birinchi 3 belgini (yoki borini) uch marta takrorlab yangi string qaytaring.
